xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.14.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.14.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Kamma
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Kamma
457.
3475Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
3476Upādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
3477Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
3478Anupādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  anupādinnā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
3479Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—  anupādinnā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
<< Pacchājātāsevanaup Vipāka >>
